discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. A Creator site role

Explanation:
To publish a data source to Tableau Server or Tableau Cloud from Tableau Desktop, the user must have the Creator site role. The Creator role grants the necessary permissions to publish workbooks, data sources, and other resources to the server or cloud.

Selected Answer: C
Creater site role can publish the datasource

Selected Answer: B
You need the admin rights. Ans is B

Selected Answer: B
To publish a data source to a Tableau Server or Tableau Cloud, you need the highest level of access: Administrator permissions.

questions.question_text: What is required to publish a data source to Tableau Server or Tableau Cloud from Tableau Desktop?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Yes. Input step in Tableau Prep Builder is where you initially bring your data sources into the flow.

questions.question_text: In which step of Tableau Prep Builder can a Data Analyst create a single table based on a matching pattern of multiple filesâ€™ names?

A Data Analyst has a Tableau workbook with multiple worksheets. The analyst created several filters on those sheets. From the data source page, the analyst plans to add additional data source filters.

Which type of filter appears automatically in the Edit Data Source Filters dialog box?

choices.D: All context filters any filters that were applied to all worksheets
choices.A: All filters that were applied to all worksheets using the data source

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
The key point is Automatically appears on edit data source filter.

Selected Answer: A
All the filters that applied to the worksheets using the same data source appeared.

Selected Answer: C
Ans is C.
It will show all the Dimension fields in the data source field window

Selected Answer: A
Ans is A.
All the filters will be shown that are applied to the same Data Source

Selected Answer: BD
Based on the provided image, the two floating elements in the dashboard are:

B. The color legend
D. The Rate of Obesity chart

Selected Answer: BD
B. The color legend
D. The Rate of Obesity chart
Add a chart in a different box, which then needs to be changed to floating and put on top of the map.
Agree. B and D are correct.

Selected Answer: BD
perfectly explained by CollectiveConsciousness

Selected Answer: BD
The answer is incorrect. It should be B and D. As you can't have a legend on a map, usually they would appear next to a chart in a different box, which then needs to be changed to floating and put on top of the map.

Selected Answer: D
User Filters in the data source filter is the most effective method for implementing Row-Level Security.

choices.A: Set up a separate dashboard for each department.
choices.B: Leverage User Filters in the dimension filter.
choices.D: Leverage User Filters in the data source filter.

questions.question_text: How should a Data Analyst implement row-level security to ensure secure access to a published data source for viewers and explorers?
